name: CreateFastlyAccount
description:
Create a new Fastly account through Datadog integration.

Use this tool to create a new Fastly account using Datadog's integration service. Ideal for setting up Fastly accounts quickly and efficiently.

parameters.name: fastly_account_creation_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the attributes for creating a Fastly account, including API key, account name, and associated services.

api_key.description: The API key for the Fastly account.

name.description: The name of the Fastly account.

id.description: The ID of the Fastly service

tags.description: A list of tags for the Fastly service.

services.description: A list of services belonging to the parent account.

attributes.description: Attributes object for creating a Fastly account.

type.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `fastly-accounts`.

data.description: Data object for creating a Fastly account.
